root.name: quad()
root.description: A quad is a quadrilateral, a four sided polygon. It is similar to a rectangle, but the angles between its edges are not constrained to ninety degrees.
root.syntax: quad(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4);

parameter.label: x1
parameter.description: int: x-coordinate of the first corner

parameter.label: y1
parameter.description: int: y-coordinate of the first corner

parameter.label: x2
parameter.description: int: x-coordinate of the second corner

parameter.label: y2
parameter.description: int: y-coordinate of the second corner

parameter.label: x3
parameter.description: int: x-coordinate of the third corner

parameter.label: y3
parameter.description: int: y-coordinate of the third corner

parameter.label: x4
parameter.description: int: x-coordinate of the fourth corner

parameter.label: y4
parameter.description: int: y-coordinate of the fourth corner
